name: Annaliese
description:
Earthy and feminine, Annaliese is a necklace hand fabricated from copper sheet metal, sterling silver, faux bone, jasper, and a face made by another artisan.

Faux Bone was distressed and colored, drilled and riveted. The copper sheet was hand cut, beveled, and meticulously hand stamped.

This is hung from a copper rollo chain and secured with a hand-fabricated clasp.

This necklace is one of a kind.

name: Relic
description:
This pendant is a gorgeous mixture of hammered copper sheet, faux bone, hammered sterling, and a bezel set labradorite.

The lab was hand soldered by me to the sterling sheet, which was then oxidized with the copper. The faux bone was distressed and the entire piece was cold connected with sterling rivets.

Sterling tube rivets enhance the holes where the pendant connects to a beautiful pure copper rollo chain. This has a hand forged S Hook pendant and the chain will be whatever length you would like, 16" if none is specified.

I have matching earrings, bangles and bracelets. Please convo me for details.

Comes in a gorgeous gift box.

name: Caged
description:
A heavy gauge copper wire was soldered into a frame and lightly hammered. Sterling wire was then wrapped around the entire structure, weaving in and out to securely hold it.

A beautiful blue tigereye stone is trapped soundly in the middle.

Comes on a black leather cord with handcrafted silver clasp. Please specify cord length.

Comes gift boxed.

name: Captured
description:
This is one of my favorite pieces to make. I have work mine now almost every day for a year. I refuse to sell that one, even though I've had offers. I feel the nature of each of these makes them unique.

Copper sheet was cut, filed, hammered, and drilled. Tube rivets were added for the jump rings. The stone itself, a large tumbled blue goldstone, is then woven into place in twisted sterling silver wire. The entire piece is made with cold connections, no torch was used.

This is not varnished in any way to allow the copper to weather naturally. As you wear and handle it, it takes on a beautiful patina that lends itself to the organic nature of this piece.

Comes on a leather cord with handcrafted clasp. Please specify cord length.

name: Love in Copper
description:
Half inch Copper circles have been hammered, gently domed, and stamped with the word LOVE or DREAM (I can make these with a word of your choice) before having a patina applied with liver of sulfur. These are shiny and earthy at the same time. 1.25" long from the top of the handmade sterling silver earwire, these are a lovely pair of earrings for a gentle soul.

As these are lovingly handmade, there may be slight variances from the picture.

Comes ready for gift giving in a small box.
